title: Nicky Whelan stuns in white as she cosies up to new boyfriend Kyle Schmid at a charity gala in LA
text:
Just last week she debuted her new romance with Canadian actor Kyle Schmid.

And on Saturday, Nicky Whelan stunned in a white dress as she cosied up to her man at a charity gala in Los Angeles.

The 38-year-old former Neighbours star stepped out with Kyle at the Last Chance For Animals 35th Anniversary Gala, with the pair gazing at each other affectionately as they posed on the red carpet.

The look of love! Former Neighbours star Nicky Whelan stunned in a white dress as she cosied up to new boyfriend Kyle Schmid at a charity gala in Los Angeles on Saturday... after the pair debuted their romance

Nicky looked gorgeous on the night in a plunging white frock, which featured sheer detailing on the sides and a mermaid train.

The blonde had her locks pulled back off her face into a low ponytail and wore makeup including dewy foundation, a glossy nude lip and a bronzed eye.

Kyle meanwhile, who appears in Netflix's The I-Land, looked dapper in a black suit and bow tie.

Looking alright in white! Nicky looked gorgeous on the night in a plunging white frock, which featured sheer detailing on the sides and a mermaid train

Details: The blonde had her locks pulled back off her face into a low ponytail and wore makeup including dewy foundation, a glossy nude lip and a bronzed eye

Nicky and Kyle appeared smitten as they walked the red carpet and couldn't take their eyes off each other.

The loved-up couple's appearance comes several days after they debuted their new relationship in Puerto Rico.

The pair were spotted holding hands and smiling while strolling through Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport on Tuesday.

She separated from her ex-husband, retired NFL star Kerry Rhodes, in 2017 after just six months of marriage.

Smitten: Nicky and Kyle appeared smitten as they walked the red carpet. The loved-up couple's appearance comes several days after they debuted their new relationship in Puerto Rico

Last year, Nicky said she was forced to 'start her life again' following her split from Kerry.

'I thought that I had lost everything - but in fact I had gained more love for myself than ever before,' she wrote on Instagram at the time.

'This time last year I walked away from my entire life with Yoda [her dog] under my arm. I started my life again at 36.

'I have lost friends - but made hundreds of new ones. I have cried on my knees - but also laughed harder than I ever have in my life.'
description: Just last week she debuted her new romance with Canadian actor Kyle Schmid.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
